description: Basic rabbitmq host stats: Node Stats, Exchanges, Channels, Consumers,  Connections, Queues, Messages, Messages per Queue, Memory, File Descriptors, Sockets.

targets.expr: count(rabbitmq_running{namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service"}) >= sum (rabbitmq_running{namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service"})
sum by (pod) (rabbitmq_connectionsTotal{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (rabbitmq_consumersTotal{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
rabbitmq_running{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"}
sum by (pod) (rabbitmq_partitions{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (rabbitmq_exchangesTotal{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (rabbitmq_channelsTotal{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (rabbitmq_queuesTotal{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (rate(rabbitmq_exchange_messages_published_in_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (pod) (rate(rabbitmq_exchange_messages_published_out_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Sum of ready and unacknowledged messages (queue depth)

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_messages{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_messages_ram{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Queue depth (ready + unACKed)

panels.description: Number of messages ready to be delivered to clients

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_messages_ready{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_messages_ready_ram{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Ready messages

panels.description: Number of messages delivered to clients but not yet acknowledged

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_messages_unacknowledged	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_messages_unacknowledged_ram	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: UnACKed messages

panels.description: Sum of the size of all message bodies in the queue. This does not include the message properties (including headers) or any overhead

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_message_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_message_bytes_ram{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Queue depth (ready + unACKed) bytes

panels.description: Like message_bytes but counting only those messages ready to be delivered to clients

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_message_bytes_ready{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Ready messages bytes

panels.description: Like message_bytes but counting only those messages delivered to clients but not yet acknowledged

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_message_bytes_unacknowledged{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: UnACKed messages bytes

panels.description: Total number of times messages have been read/written from/to the disk by this queue since it started

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_disk_reads	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_disk_writes	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Disk reads/writes

panels.description: Total number of persistent messages in the queue (will always be 0 for transient queues)

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (queue_messages_persistent	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Messages persistent

panels.description: Like message_bytes but counting only those messages which are persistent

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (queue_messages_persistent_bytes	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Messages persistent bytes

panels.description: Bytes of memory consumed by the Erlang process associated with the queue, including stack, heap and internal structures

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_memory{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.title: Queue memory

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_consumers	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"})

panels.description: Fraction of the time that the queue is able to immediately deliver messages to consumers. This can be less than 1.0 if consumers are limited by network congestion or prefetch count

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rabbitmq_queue_consumer_utilisation	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}) * 100

panels.title: Queue consumer utilization

panels.description: Count of messages published and confirmed

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_published_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_confirmed_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Messages published / confirmed

panels.description: Count of messages delivered in acknowledgement or no-acknowledgement mode to consumers

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_delivered_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_delivered_noack_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Messages delivered ACK / noACK modes

panels.description: Count of messages delivered in acknowledgement or no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_get_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_get_noack_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Get messages delivered ACK / noACK modes

panels.description: Count of messages returned to publisher as unroutable

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_returned_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Messages returned

panels.description: Count of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set

targets.expr: sum by(pod, durable, queue, vhost, policy) (rate(rabbitmq_queue_messages_redelivered_total	{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", vhost=~"$vhost", queue=~"$queue"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Messages redelivered

targets.expr: sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_sockets_used{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_sockets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_node_mem_used{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_node_mem_limit{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_fd_used{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_fd_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_node_disk_free{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})
sum by (pod, node) (rabbitmq_node_disk_free_limit{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"})

title: RabbitMQ Legacy
